author: Anonymous Beaker
title: MT problem 4 grade changed
question: Hi, I'm not sure if it's just me but I noticed that since this morning my MT Problem 4 is now marked as ungraded on Gradescope, and the autograder score has dropped by a lot? I have not made any changes to the problem or resubmitted anything and am unsure as to what happened?
student_answer: I've got the same problem, and it says it took 50% away because my helper function didn't take Project as the first argument, even though it clearly did. Hoping this is just some kind of bug or something!
instructor_answer:
I'm thinking this is a bug, seems like there may have been a Gradescope hiccup. Don't panic!
Edit: Fixed! Thanks, Gregor :)
